statements: SELECT * FROM robot_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT robot_id, next_maintenance_date FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, service_record FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE service_record IS NOT NULL;
SELECT robot_id, next_maintenance_date, service_record FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM robot_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC, robot_id
SELECT robot_id, service_record FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date >= '2022-06-30'
SELECT robot_id, next_maintenance_date FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE robot_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT robot_id, next_maintenance_date FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE service_record LIKE '%inspection%'
SELECT robot_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Monthly';
SELECT * FROM service_records WHERE service_type = 'Repair' ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT service_date, service_type, technician_id FROM service_records WHERE robot_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE robot_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Inspection' AND schedule_id > 5;
SELECT robot_id, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM robot_maintenance_schedule GROUP BY robot_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT robot_id FROM robot_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT service_date, service_type FROM service_records WHERE technician_id = 10 ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Robot_Maintenance_Schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, maintenance_type ASC
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_date FROM Robot_Maintenance_Schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'inspection'
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM Technicians ORDER BY technician_experience_years DESC
SELECT DISTINCT robot_id FROM Service_Records
SELECT technician_id, technician_name FROM Technicians WHERE technician_specialty = 'electrical'
SELECT * FROM Technicians;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty, technician_experience_years FROM Technicians ORDER BY technician_experience_years DESC;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM Robot_Maintenance_Schedule WHERE maintenance_type='Preventive';
SELECT service_id, service_date, service_type, service_details FROM Service_Records WHERE service_type='Repair' ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM Robot_Maintenance_Schedule JOIN Technicians ON Robot_Maintenance_Schedule.technician_id = Technicians.technician_id;
SELECT * FROM robot_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_type FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, build_date FROM robot_inventory ORDER BY build_date DESC;
SELECT service_id, service_date, technician_name FROM service_records WHERE technician_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT robot_id, status, last_update FROM robot_status WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM robot_maintenance_schedule WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM service_records WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe' AND service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT robot_id, status FROM robot_status WHERE last_update > '2022-07-01';
SELECT robot_id, robot_name FROM robot_inventory WHERE location LIKE 'Warehouse%';
SELECT * FROM robot_owners;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM robot_owners ORDER BY owner_id DESC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturing_date FROM robot_models WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT center_name, location FROM service_centers WHERE center_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM robot_owners WHERE owner_name = 'Alice';
SELECT model_name, manufacturing_date FROM robot_models ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-30';
SELECT center_name, location FROM service_centers WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT robot_id, scheduled_date, status FROM service_schedule WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC;
